name: DD_DIALYSIS_VACCINATION_G
description: This table contains data elements submitted for CMS ESRD patient vaccination form.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: DLYS_VACCINE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination type.

columns.name: DLYS_VACCINE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination received status.

columns.name: DLYS_VACCINE_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination name.

columns.name: RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination received date.

columns.name: RECEIVED_DATE_APPROX_YN
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's vaccination received date is approximate.

columns.name: ADVERSE_REACT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient had an adverse reaction from the vaccination.

columns.name: ADVERSE_REACT_COMMENT
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores comments about an adverse reaction that a dialysis patient had from the vaccination.

columns.name: ADVERSE_REACT_FDA_REPORTED_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's vaccination adverse reaction was reported to the FDA.

columns.name: DLYS_HEPB_DOSE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's hepatitis B vaccination dose is part of a series or a booster.

columns.name: DLYS_VACCIN_NT_RCV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination not received reason.
entries: Medical Reason - Allergic or Adverse Reaction
Series Completed per Antibody Test Result

columns.name: VACCINE_NT_RCV_CMT
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's vaccination not received reason comments.

columns.name: OFFERED_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores the date when the vaccination was offered to a dialysis patient.

columns.name: OFFERED_DATE_APPROX_YN
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient's vaccination offered date is approximate.

columns.name: HEPB_ANTIHBS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores whether a dialysis patient received a hepatitis B antibody test.

columns.name: ANTIHBS_VALUE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's hepatitis B antibodies test result value.

columns.name: ANTIHBS_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's hepatitis B antibodies test date.
